string.value: You meet Sophia in the department store in Perion. She's working on her dream to be an alchemist. To make the sparkling rock, she says she needs #b50 squishy liquids, 50 leaves, 20 octopus legs#k and #b1 Arcon's blood#k. Everything looks reasonable enough...wait, Arcon's blood?! Fortunately, Sophia knows where to get some. She says to have a chat with Manji, who's somewhere around Perion.
Sophia told you that Manji has some Arcon's Blood, a key ingredient to make a sparkling rock.
So you are looking for a #b#t4031004##k? That stone is very rare. Alright then, get me the items, I list. Ready?

#b50 #t4000004#s#e#n, 50 #t4000005#s#e#n, 20 #t4000006#s#e#n#k and #b1 #t4031005##e#n#k. Everything should be fairly easy to get. Except for the #t4031005#. You should ask #r#p1022002##k about that one. He is somewhere around town.

If you have 50 #b#t4000004#s#e#n #k, 50 #b#t4000005#s#e#n #k, 20 #b#t4000006#s#e#n#k, 1 #b#t4031005##e#n#k, you can make 1 #b#t4031004##k... You should ask #r#p1022002##k about the #t4031005#... I think he is somewhere around #m102000000#.
